name: Nikssa
description: Nikssa is being built with the idea of providing varied solutions through a single platform. The more we explore, the more we develop. A development community which prefers to build applications which aligns with the blockchain technology. We believe that the potential of blockchain is way bigger as a technology rather than the X times a coin makes in the market. Nikssa building an ecosystem which blends the needs of the crypto community into one shell. We see a long journey and we wish to take one step at a time. Starting small we developed swap, stake and bulk sender for our users through Nikssa.
